# archestra_role (Resource)

Archestra Role

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "archestra_role" "example" {
  name        = "example-role"
  description = "A role for testing purposes"
  permissions = ["read:users", "write:users"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Detailed name of the role
- `permissions` (List of String) List of permissions assigned to the role

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the role

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Role identifier
